analyzed: nārāyaṇaparipṛcchā ārya mahāmāyā vijayavāhinī nāma dhāraṇī
namaḥ sarva buddha bodhisattvebhyaḥ

original: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasminsamaye bhagavān svarṇaśṛṅge parvatāgre vaiśravaṇasya gṛhe viharati sma |
analyzed: evam mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān svarṇaśṛṅge parvata agre vaiśravaṇasya gṛhe viharati sma

original: tatra devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragavidyādharāpsaraḥprabhṛtibhirbahubhiḥ stutaṃ dharmālokamukhaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayati  #
analyzed: tatra deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga vidyādhara apsaraḥ prabhṛtibhiḥ bahubhiḥ stutam dharmālokamukham nāma dharmaparyāyam deśayati  /
sma

original: athāsurairnigṛhīto vinirdhūtaḥ parājitastejohīno nārāyaṇo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāmadupasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā'bhivandyaikānte  #
analyzed: atha asuraiḥ nigṛhītaḥ vinirdhūtaḥ parājitaḥ tejaḥ hīnaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ yena bhagavān tena upasaṅkrāmat upasaṅkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya ekānte  /
sthitaḥ
ekānte sthitaḥ ca nārāyaṇaḥ evam prārthayāñcake

original: tadevaṃ deśayatu bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī sarvasattvānukampakastaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yamete devanāgayakṣarākṣasādayo manuṣyā vā dhārayamāṇāḥ  #
analyzed: tat evam deśayatu bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sarva darśī sarva sattva anukampakaḥ tam dharmaparyāyam yam ete deva nāga yakṣa rākṣasa ādayaḥ manuṣyāḥ vā dhārayamāṇāḥ

original: saṃgrāme mahāśūlapātebhyo vā sarvopadravebhyo vā sarvavitarkavicārebhyo vā vijayino bhaviṣyanni ||2 ||
analyzed: saṃgrāme mahā śūla pātebhyaḥ vā sarva upadravebhyaḥ vā sarva vitarka vicārebhyaḥ vā vijayinaḥ
bhagavān āha asi māyā dharaḥ tvam nārāyaṇa
māyāvān tvam mahāvalaḥ asi
aneka māyā jālena sattvān vañcayasi
kim iha bhayāt saṃgrāma vijaya praśnam paripṛcchasi
nārāyaṇaḥ evam āha
iha bhagavan kāma asura indreṇa asura māyā jitā ūham
mṛtāḥ devāḥ kecid palāyitāḥ kecid vidhvaṃsitāḥ

original: tato deśaya bhagavan taṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ yadete sattvā saṃgrāmavijayino bhaviṣyanti |
analyzed: tatas deśaya bhagavan tam dharmaparyāyam yat ete sattvāḥ saṃgrāma vijayinaḥ bhaviṣyanti
asurā parājayisyante hīyamāna darpāḥ ca parāḥ bhaviṣyanti
bhagavān āha

original: bhūtapūrvaṃ nārāyaṇātīte'dhvani magadhe rohitaparvate ratnaśrīrnāma rājā babhūva |
analyzed: bhūta pūrvam nārāyaṇa atīta idhvani magadhe rohita parvate ratnaśrīḥ nāma rājā babhūva

original: tena kālena tena samayena sarveśvaro nāma tathāgataḥ arhansamyak sambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ  #
analyzed: tena kālena tena samayena sarveśvaraḥ nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyak sambuddhaḥ vidyā caraṇa sampannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ  /
deva manuṣyāṇām śāstā bhagavān buddhaḥ sambabhūva

original: tasya bhagavataḥ sarveśvarasya sakāśād mayā imāni mahāmāyāvijayavāhinī nāma vidyāmantrapadāni sugṛhītāni dhāritāti ca paṭhitāni avagatāni anumoditāni  #
analyzed: tasya bhagavataḥ sarveśvarasya sakāśāt mayā imāni mahāmāyāvijayavāhinī nāma vidyā mantra padāni su gṛhītāni dhāritā ati ca paṭhitāni avagatāni anumoditāni  /
parasya ca vistareṇa samprakāśitāni

original: asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāveṇa nārāyaṇa na jātu aribhayaṃ na akuśalabhayaṃ na corabhayaṃ vā bhavet |
analyzed: asyāḥ dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāveṇa nārāyaṇa na jātu ari bhayam na akuśala bhayam na cora bhayam vā bhavet

original: varṣaśatasahasrāṇi ca rājyaṃ dharmeṇa kṛtvā paśvātsaukhyena nagarānnagarāntaraṃ pramodavanayātrāmiva dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāveṇa gataḥ |
analyzed: varṣa śata sahasrāṇi ca rājyam dharmeṇa kṛtvā paśvāt saukhyena nagarāt nagara antaram pramodavana yātrām iva dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāveṇa gataḥ

original: janmāntare māndhātā nāma bodhisattvaścakravartī rājā babhūva |
analyzed: janmāntare māndhātā nāma bodhisattvaḥ cakravartī rājā babhūva
sapta ratna samanvāgataḥ ca
bhuvana tritaya anteṣu ājñām pracāritavāna

original: pūrvaṃ dānapāramitāniṣpannatayā sarvasattvebhyo hitāya sukhāya ca yathābhilaṣitaṃ dhanaṃ vavarṣa |
analyzed: pūrvam dāna pāramitā niṣpanna tayā sarva sattvebhyaḥ hitāya sukhāya ca yathā abhilaṣitam dhanam vavarṣa
sarva sattva sukha karaḥ sarva hitakaḥ ca babhūva
tat yathā nārāyaṇa asyāḥ dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāveṇa aneka kalpa śata sahasra dāna pāramitayā paripūrim cakāra

original: ye ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragavidyādharamanuṣyāmanuṣyā yathādiśaṃ tiṣṭhanti na ca vaimukhyaṃ kurvanti | ]
analyzed: ye ca deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga vidyādhara manuṣya amanuṣyāḥ yathādiśam tiṣṭhanti na ca vaimukhyam kurvanti

original: sa catuḥṣaṣṭikalpasahasrāṇi pūrvaṃ yāpayitvā paścādekasmin janmani garuḍabhayānmuktaḥ saṃsthito nāgendra iva anuttaraḥ samyak sambuddho buddho  #
analyzed: sa catuḥṣaṣṭi kalpa sahasrāṇi pūrvam yāpayitvā paścāt ekasmin janmani garuḍa bhayāt muktaḥ saṃsthitaḥ nāga indraḥ iva anuttaraḥ samyak sambuddhaḥ buddhaḥ  /
hi devaguruḥ babhūva

original: tena nārāyaṇa gṛhāṇatvaṃ mahāmāyāvijayavāhinīṃ nāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāṇi |
analyzed: tena nārāyaṇa gṛhāṇa tvam mahāmāyā vijayavāhinīm nāma dhāraṇī mantra padāṇi
tat yathā namaḥ astu adhva anugata pratiṣṭhitebhyaḥ sarva buddha bodhisattvebhyaḥ
sarva mudrā mantra padebhyaḥ

original: om māye mahāmāye mahāmāyādhāraṇi iyaṃ sā mahāmāyāmantreṇa mahāmāyārūpeṇa |
analyzed: om māye mahāmāye mahāmāyā dhāraṇi iyam sā mahāmāyā mantreṇa mahāmāyā rūpeṇa

original: bhrama bhrama sattvānāñca ye virūdhakaṃ cintayanti sarvaduṣṭasattvāstān bhrāmaya bhrāmaya mohaya mohaya mūrcchāpaya mūrcchāpaya māraya māraya  #
analyzed: bhrama bhrama sattvānām ca ye virūdhakam cintayanti sarva duṣṭa sattvāḥ tān bhrāmaya bhrāmaya mohaya mohaya mūrcchāpaya mūrcchāpaya māraya māraya
vidhvaṃsaya vidhvaṃsaya

original: mara mara mahāmāye alalalale mahāmāyājālasahasramukhi sahasraśire sahasramuje jvalitanetre sarvatathāgatahṛdayagarbhe asidhanuparaśupāśatomarakanayaśaktinṛmuṇḍihaste  #
analyzed: mara mara mahāmāye alalalale mahāmāyā jāla sahasra mukhi sahasra śire sahasra muje jvalita netre sarva tathāgata hṛdaya garbhe asi dhanu paraśu pāśa tomara kanaya śakti nṛ muṇḍi haste

original: mudgaracakrahaste ehyehi bhagavati sarvatathāgatasatyena devarṣigaṇasatyena mahāmāyāvijayavāhinī smara smara sarvatathāgatajñānarūpeṇa gaccha  #
analyzed: mudgara cakra haste ehi ehi bhagavati sarva tathāgata satyena deva ṛṣi gaṇa satyena mahāmāyā vijaya vāhinī smara smara sarva tathāgata jñāna rūpeṇa gaccha  /

original: gaccha sarvāvaraṇakṣayaṅkari parasainyavidrāviṇi mohaya mohaya mama sarvasattvānāñca sarvaduṣṭān |

original: nārāyaṇa gṛhītvā tvamevaṃ mahāmāyāvijayavāhinīṃ nāma guhyamantrapadāni paṭhitvā ca parasya vistareṇa upadiśa |
analyzed: nārāyaṇa gṛhītvā tvam evam mahāmāyā vijayavāhinīm nāma guhya mantra padāni paṭhitvā ca parasya vistareṇa upadiśa

original: nārāyaṇa atha tasmin samparāye senayorubhayormadhye pañcasu sthāneṣu etaddhāraṇīcakraṃ rathapratikṛtau yuñjyāt |
analyzed: nārāyaṇa atha tasmin samparāye senayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhye pañcasu sthāneṣu etat dhāraṇī cakram ratha pratikṛtau yuñjyāt

original: nārāyaṇa ubhayormadhye parasenāgre tasmin rathamadhye mahāmāyāvijayavāhiṇīṃ nāma vidyārājñīṃ anekaśatasahasrarūpāṃ anekaśatasahasrabhujāṃ trinetrāṃ  #
analyzed: nārāyaṇaḥ ubhayoḥ madhye para senā agre tasmin ratha madhye mahāmāyāvijayavāhiṇīm nāma vidyā rājñīm aneka śata sahasra rūpām aneka śata sahasra bhujām tri netrām
lohita kṛṣṇa varṇām dīptaiḥ catur vaktraiḥ para senām bhakṣayantīm iva cintayet

original: svayameva cakravartyākāraṃ kṛtvā madhyānhe dhāraṇīṃ kuṅkumena likhitvā rājā parasya ca senāṃ svabhāvena māyāsadṛśena cchādayan vividhena sāreṇa  #
analyzed: svayam eva cakravarti ākāram kṛtvā madhyānhe dhāraṇīm kuṅkumena likhitvā rājā parasya ca senām svabhāvena māyā sadṛśena chādayan vividhena sāreṇa
vijayī bhaviṣyati

original: nārāyaṇa ariyodhāḥ nirjitāḥ parājitāḥ kecit murcchitā bhūtale patantīti vadāmi |
analyzed: nārāyaṇa ari yodhāḥ nirjitāḥ parājitāḥ kecid murcchitāḥ bhū tale patanti iti vadāmi

original: nārāyaṇa evaṃ patitāśca daśākuśalakarmabhiḥ mārgocchedād hriyante |
analyzed: nārāyaṇe evam patitāḥ ca daśā akuśala karmabhiḥ mārga ucchedāt hriyante

original: teṣāṃ ca jīvitaṃ pratihataphalaṃ na bhavati |
analyzed: teṣām ca jīvitam pratihata phalam na bhavati
nārāyaṇaḥ īdṛśaḥ prabhāvaḥ praśastāyāḥ dhāraṇyāḥ

original: nārāyaṇa apica kasyacidetāni dhāraṇīmantrapadāni vā śuddhyāśuddhyā yogyāni |
analyzed: nārāyaṇa apica kasyacid etāni dhāraṇī mantra padāni vā śuddhyā aśuddhyā yogyāni
upavāsena anupavāsena vā yogyāni bhavanti
pratidinam tri vāram uccārayet

original: tenaiva kṛtamapi pañcānantaryapāparāśiṃ kṣapayitvā prāptapuṇyarāśirjātismaro bhavati |
analyzed: tena eva kṛtam api pañca ānantarya pāpa rāśim kṣapayitvā prāpta puṇya rāśiḥ jātismaraḥ bhavati
sarva sattveṣu sarva vyāpi dhana upabhogī kuśala dharma bhirata ukuśala viparīta pātakeṣu na bhavati

original: yaśca punarnārāyaṇā imāṃ [yogyāṃ] dhāraṇīṃ dhārayamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhikṣurvā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā rājā vā rājaputro  #
analyzed: yaḥ ca punar nārāyaṇāḥ imām yogyām dhāraṇīm dhārayamāṇaḥ kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā bhikṣuḥ vā bhikṣuṇī vā upāsakaḥ vā upāsikā vā rājā vā rāja putraḥ

original: vā brāhmaṇo vā mṛtaḥ kālagataḥ saddharmabhāṇako vā dagdho bhasmībhūto vā punaśca puruṣo vā strī vā kācit spṛśet sa eva niyato jātismaro bhaviṣyati
analyzed: vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā mṛtaḥ kālagataḥ saddharma bhāṇakaḥ vā dagdhaḥ bhasmībhūtaḥ vā punar ca puruṣaḥ vā strī vā kācid spṛśet saḥ eva niyataḥ jātismaraḥ bhaviṣyati

original: [tato] bodhisattvasaṃvarīyo nārāyanaḥ aho [āścaryamiti] kṛtvā śaṅkhacakragadāpuṣpamālyayuktaḥ [utthāyāsanāt] bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya  #
analyzed: tatas bodhisattva saṃvarīyaḥ nārāyanaḥ aho āścaryam iti kṛtvā śaṅkha cakra gadā puṣpa mālya yuktaḥ utthāya āsanāt bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇīkṛtya

original: praṇamya prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ gāthayā stauti sma |
analyzed: praṇamya prahasita vadanaḥ bhūtvā bhagavantam gāthayā stauti sma

original: aho hyasuradevānāṃ lokānāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭho hyanuttarīkaḥ |
analyzed: aho hi asura devānām lokānām jyeṣṭham śreṣṭhaḥ hi anuttarīkaḥ
śivaḥ śāntaḥ utha a grāhya loka atītaḥ namaḥ astu te
abhāvaḥ sarva dharmāṇām bhūta dharma prakāśakaḥ
dharma adharma vimuktau tau dharma satya namaḥ astu te

original: atha nārāyaṇaḥ bhagavantaṃ praṇamya tvaṃ [mama vibhuḥ] bhagavanniti kṛtvā prakānto'bhūt |
analyzed: atha nārāyaṇaḥ bhagavantam praṇamya tvam mama vibhuḥ bhagavan iti kṛtvā

original: idamavocad bhagavānāttamanāḥ te ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoraga[vidyādharā]psarādayaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsueragaruḍagandharvaśca  #
analyzed: idam avocat bhagavān ātta manāḥ te ca deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga vidyādhara apsarā ādayaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣad sa deva mānuṣa asu era garuḍa gandharvaḥ ca
lokaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāṣitam abhyanandan iti
nārāyaṇaparipṛcchā ārya mahāmāyāvijayavāhinī nāma dhāraṇī samāptā
